titles.title: A bill to release restrictions on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 10/5/1988--Introduced. Releases restrictions on the use or conveyance of certain property in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana. Provides that the United States shall have the use of such property for national defense purposes in time of war or national emergency.
